title: Vannam Konda Vennilave Lyrics Sigaram
stanzas:
vinnile paadhai illai
unnai thoda yaeni illai(2)

pakkathil neeyum illai
paarvayil eeram illai
sondhathil baashai illai
swaasikka aasai illai (2)

kandu vandhu solvadharkku
kaatrukku nyaanam illai.
neelaththai pirithuvittaal
vaanathil yaedhum illai.

Vannam konda vennilave
vaanam vittu vaaraayo
Vannam konda vennilave

Nangai undhan koondhalukku
natchathira poo parithaen
nangai vandhu saeravillai
natchathiram vaaduthadi (2)

kanni unni paarthiruppen
kaalkadukka kaathiruppen
jeevan vandhu serum varai
dhegam pol naan kidappen.

devi vandhu serndhuvittaal
aavi kondu naan nadappen.

Vannam konda vennilave
vaanam vittu vaaraayo
vinnile paadhai illai
unnai thoda yaeni illai

Vannam konda vennilave
vaanam vittu vaaraayo.
Vannam konda vennilave
